name: Color Copy Cats
description:
Play as Panko, the magical cat. Every 10 seconds, Panko changes color and gains abilities! Navigate your way through the clouds & portals while finding all the sweet snacks to keep Panko happy!

Controls

-A or left arrow keys to move left.

-D or right arrow keys to move right.

-Space bar to jump.

Known Bugs

-Panko gets stuck on the floor in a jump pose on occasion. As of now, there seems to be no way to resolve this in-game other than to restart or advance to the next level.

-There may be resizing issues with HTML builds.

Created by Caroline Wang in 72 Hours.
